basics.name: Frederik Leidloff
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a berlin based Frontend Engineer working at mobile.de. The past years, I worked woth different technologies, including React.js, ES6, less, node.js, CSS3, HTML5, mocha and many more.

work.summary: As part of the mobile.de long-term-monetization project: rewrite of the inventory list with React.js.
Working on a Call Tracking solution for all mobile.de dealers. Also started to facilitate Retrospectives for other teams.

Started working at mobile.de as Junior Software Engineer for the AutoAct Team. From 2014 on, working on the commercial side of the mobile.de product. Co-organized a Design Thinking Workshop for the mobile.de commercial Team.

education.studyType: Master of Science in IT-Systems Engineering
education.summary: Specialized in Internet & Security Technology. Master's Thesis Title: "Sensor Fusion for Understanding Design Thinking Teams". Grade: A-

education.institution: HPI School of Design Thinking, Potsdam

education.studyType: Bachelor of Science in IT-Systems Engineering
education.summary: Specialized in Internet technologies and systems. Grade: B+

interests: I play the saxophone in a salsa band (www.esquina-latina.de), I like sports (Cycling, Football), I do photography (instagram/fred.berlin.photos ) and love traveling.
